attributes.action: Apologise to the British people for giving away our sovereignty.
attributes.additional_details: We do not care which government body thinks it is sovereign; they are only there because of us. Sovereignty is paid in full by the blood of its citizens. It is our sovereignty and NOONE has the right to distribute it without our say so.
attributes.background: We call upon the government to acknowledge that it has never been awarded the authority to grant jurisdiction over our laws to any foreign agency, and to apologise on behalf of successive governments for the repercussions and offence this has caused its citizens.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
